org.accada.reader.rprm.core.msg.command
Class ValueParameter

java.lang.Object
  org.accada.reader.rprm.core.msg.command.Parameter
      org.accada.reader.rprm.core.msg.command.ValueParameter

public class ValueParameter
extends Parameter

This class is used as a helper class in the text parser. During parsing the simple value parameters are parsed into such a ValueParameter object.

Author:
Andreas Fürer, ETH Zurich Switzerland, Winter 2005/06
See Also:
TextCommandParserHelper
